targets.expr: pg_settings_autovacuum_analyze_threshold{instance="$instance"} + pg_settings_autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor{instance="$instance"} * ignoring(datname, schemaname, relname) pg_stat_user_tables_n_live_tup{instance="$instance", datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"}

pg_statio_user_tables_heap_blks_hit{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"} / (pg_statio_user_tables_heap_blks_hit{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"} + pg_statio_user_tables_heap_blks_read{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"})

pg_statio_user_tables_idx_blks_hit{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"} / (pg_statio_user_tables_idx_blks_hit{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"} + pg_statio_user_tables_idx_blks_read{datname="$db", schemaname="$schema", relname="$table"})
